content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]The Ikegami MKC-704k is a top of the line retinal camera that combines a high sensitivity 3-chip sensor with 4k resolution. It uses a standard C-mount, and is compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® video adapters.

  • Upscaled 4k resolution (2160p)
  • 1/3″ 3-chip CMOS sensor
  • Standard C-mount
  • F17 light sensitivity ideal for retinal surgery
  • HDMI (using converter), DVI, and 4x SDI outputs
  • 5 or 7 meter cable, 10m extension available

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72880″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574813488796{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Ikegami MKC-704k

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]When light sensitivity and resolution are both top priorities the MKC-704k is the solution. This camera has the highest light sensitivity of any 4k camera on the market making it a top of the line option for capturing medical video. HDMI out is available by using a 4x SDI converter.

Compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® adapters the MKC-704k can be configured to any magnification you prefer, with the option for optical zoom for the best video experience.

The full specifications for the MKC-704k can be found here.

Sample videos can be found on our YouTube page.

Part # MKC-704k[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54fe35-8ff9″][vc_column_text]

Compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® video adapters.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dfe35-8ff9″][vc_column_text]Ikegami C-mount cameras are class 1 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014afe35-8ff9″][vc_column_text]

Ikegami C-mount cameras include a 3 year manufacturer’s warranty.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
